titles.title: Upper Raritan River Watershed Wild and Scenic River Study Act of 2025
Upper Raritan River Watershed Wild and Scenic River Study Act of 2025

A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate the Upper Raritan River Watershed in the State of New Jersey for study for potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
